descriptionHtml:
--------------------Basic Info---------------------------
He is a nord
He is level 15
he cannot be killed
He is located at Whitrun 
--------------------Equipment---------------------------
Imperial Heavy armour
Steel sword
Coin 
--------------------Lore----------------------------------
Ameil was named after Sir Amiel Lannus from The Knights of the Nine .He Joined the legion he was 15 when the battle of Red Ring took place and fought in the Eighth Legion and was nearly killed 
by Thalmor Soldier. He was saved by Lt. Mythois of the Tenth legion.
Amiel was carried to safety and was healed. He then went on to fight
in the regaining of the Imperial city. Being one of the lucky ones to survive the
battle the White-Gold Concordat was signed. He was then transferred to Skyrim.
He was traveling with Lt.Mythois, On the way they were ambushed by Thalmor that 
didn\'t agree with the White-Gold Concordat and most of them were killed. Ameil manged to 
escape the ambush he made it to skyrim and stopped in Dragons bridge. He later traveled to Whitrun Were he resided today.
--------------------------Recommend mods to go with-------------------------
Ultimate follower overhauled made by fLokii -----------------http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037
Haafingar Elite made by me ------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25719
author: Myth0is
